hopobject.name: sniffer-beagle
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.0.8) Gecko/2009033100 Ubuntu/9.04 (jaunty) Firefox/3.0.8
hopobject.body: Sniffer-beagle will be a robot which will able to find out direction of gas (A perticular gas for it is being trained).It will follow the direction of gas and try to figure out source of gas.If the gas is "Hazardous" it will blow a alarm.A camera attached to this will be able to show current view. With the help of beagle board capture data can be transmitted over WLAN.
hopobject.shortdesc: Sniffer-beagle will be a robot which will able to sense a GAS and react according to program
